item.title: OpenSearch
item.description:
I search online every day. I search on Google, StackOverflow, GitHub, Maven Central, Gradle Plugins repository, YouTube and dozen of other sites. And, I wonâ€™t deny, sometimes I search on Pornhub.

I bet you search too.

item.title: Preserving MongoDB shell history in Docker
item.description: So, you run mongo in disposable Docker containers and want to preserve shell history? Say no more, pal.
